Translations.Text: tyara pachi ame teni koma mate akasa manthi ko'i laskara na utaryu ane na avi rite ame utari'e chi'e
te to phakta eka sakhata cisa hati, jethi te'o acanaka holava'i gayeli (aga) jeva tha'i gaya
(ava) banda'o mate kheda che, kyareya temani pase ko'i eva payagambara nathi avya, jemani maskari te loko'e na kari hoya
sum te loko'e nathi joyum ke temana pahela ghani komone ame nasta kari didhi, ke te'o temani tarapha pacha nahim ave
ane ko'i jutha evum nathi, jene ame bhega kari amari samaksa nahim lavi'e
ane temana mate eka nisani (nisprana) dharati che, jene ame jivita kari didhi ane temanthi anaja ugadyum, jemanthi te'o khaya che
ane ame temam khajuro ane draksana bagica banavya ane jemam ame jharanam pana vahavi didha che
jethi (loko) tena phalo khaya ane tene te lokona hatho'e nathi banavyum, pachi abhara kema nathi manata
Te pavitra hasti che, jene dareka vastune jodimam banavi, bhalene te dharati'e upajaveli vastu hoya, athava te'o pote hoya, athava te (vastu'o) hoya jena vise a loko janata pana nathi
ane temana mate eka nisani rata che, jena dvara ame divasane khenci la'i'e chi'e, jethi te'o acanaka andhakaramam jata rahe che
ane surya mate je nakki karela sima che, te teni upara ja calato rahe che, a nakki karela sima'o che, je vijayi ane jnanavala allaha taraphathi che
ane candrani manjilo ame nakki kari che, tyam sudhi ke te pacho avi juni (suki) dali jevo tha'i jaya che
surya, candrane pakadi nathi sakato ane na to rata, divasa karata agala vadhi sake che ane badha ja akasomam tare che
ane te loko mate eka nisani (a pana) che ke ame temani pedhine bhareli hodimam musaphari karavi
ane temana mate tena jevi ja biji vastu'o banavi jena para a loko musaphari kare che
ane jo ame icchata, to temane dubadi deta, pachi na to ko'i temani phariyada karavavalo hota ane na te lokone bacavavamam avata
parantu ame potana taraphathi krpa kari'e chi'e ane eka muddata sudhi temane phayado pahoncadi rahya chi'e
ane temane jyare kahevamam ave che ke agala-pachalana (papa)thi bacine raho, jethi tamara para krpa karavamam ave
ane temani pase temana palanaharani nisani'o manthi ko'i nisani evi nathi, jenathi a loko cheta na raheta hoya

ane jyare te lokone kahevamam ave che ke allaha'e apela (dhana) manthi kharca karo, to inkara karanara'o imanavalane javaba ape che ke ame temane kema khavadavi'e, jemane jo allaha icchato to pote ja khavadavi deto, tame spasta rite pathabhrasta cho
te'o kahe che ke a vacana kayare avase, saca hoya to janavo
Te loko to phakta eka sakhata cisani raha jo'i rahya chi'e, je cisa temane pakadi lese ane a loko andaro'andara jhaghadata hase
te samaye na to a loko vasiyata kari sakase ane na potana gharavala'o tarapha pacha avi sakse
sura phunkatani sathe ja dareka potani kabaro manthi (uthi) potana palanahara tarapha calava lagase
kaheva lagase, haya aphasosa! Amane amara sapanana sthalethi kone jagadya? A ja che, jenum vacana rahamane apyum hatum ane payagambaro'e sacum kahi didhum hatum
a eka cisa sivaya kami nathi, acanaka dareke dareka amari samaksa hajara kari devamam avase
basa! Ajana divase ko'i vyakti upara, thodoka pana atyacara karavamam nahim ave ane tamane tamara karmono ja badalo apavamam avase
jannati loko aja na divase potana karyomam khusa che
te ane temani patni'o chanyadamam asano para takiya lagavine betha hase
temana mate jannatamam dareka prakarana phalo hase, uparanta te'o je pana icchase, (te badhum ja malase)
dayalu palanahara taraphathi temane"salama" kahevamam avase
he aparadhi'o! Aje tame alaga tha'i java
he adamana santano! Sum mem tamari pasethi vacana na lidhum hatum? Ke tame setanani bandagi na karaso, te tamaro khullo satru che
ane mari ja bandagi karajo, satya marga a ja che
setane tamara manthi ghana lokone pathabhrasta kari didha, sum tame samajata nathi
a ja te jahannama che, jenum vacana tamane apavamam avatu hatum
potana inkarano badalo melavava mate aje amam dakhala tha'i java
ame ajana divase temana modha upara mahora lagavi da'isum ane temana hatha amari sathe vata-cita karase ane temana paga saksi apase, te karyoni, je te'o karata hatam
Jo ame icchata to temane drstihina kari deta, pachi a loko marga melavava mate bhagadoda karata, parantu te loko kevi rite jo'i sake
ane jo ame icchata to temani jagya para ja temana modha badali deta, pachi na to te'o cali sakata ane na to pacha phari sakata
ane jene ame vrdvavastha'e la'i ja'i'e chi'e, tene balapana tarapha palatavi da'i'e chi'e, sum to pana te'o nathi samajata
na to ame te payagambarane sayari (kavita) sikhavadi ane na to temane te sobhe che, te to phakta sikhamana ane spasta kura'ana (ni ayato) che
jethi te'o, te dareka vyaktine saceta kari de je jivita che ane inkara karanara'o mate dalila sabita tha'i jaya
sum te'o jota nathi ke ame amara hatha vade banaveli vastu'o manthi temana mate dhoronum sarjana karyum, jena te'o malika tha'i gaya che
ane te dhorone ame temane adhina kari didha che, jemanthi ketalaka temani savari mate che ane ketalakanum mansa khaya che
te'one tenathi bija ghana phayada che ane piva mateni vastu'o, sum to (pana) te'o abhara vyakta nahim kare
ane te'o allahane chodine bijane pujya banave che, jethi te'oni madada karavamam ave
(jo ke) te'omam temani madada karavani sakti ja nathi, (parantu) to pana (musarika loko) temana mate hajara rahevavala sainiko banela che
basa! Tame temani vatothi nirasa na thaso, ame temani chupi ane jahera, dareka vatone jani'e chi'e
sum manavine etali pana khabara nathi ke ame tenum sarjana eka tipa vade karyum? Pachi tarata ja te khullo jhaghado karavavalo bani gayo
ane tene apana mate udaharana apyum ane potani janmane bhuli gayo, kaheva lagyo, a sadi gayela hadakamone kona jivita kari sakase
Tame javaba api do ke a hadakane te jivita karase, jene temanum sarjana prathama vara karyum hatum, je dareka prakarana sarjanane khuba sari rite jane che
te ja che, jene tamaram mate lilanchama vrkso manthi aga utpanna kari, jenathi tame tarata ja aga salagavo cho
jene akaso ane dharatinum sarjana karyum, sum te a loko jevanum sarjana nathi kari sakto? Ni:Sanka kari sake che ane te ja to, hikamatavalo, sarjaka (allaha) che
te jyare pana ko'i vastuni iccha kare che, tene etalum ja kahi de che ke, tha'i ja, to te, te ja samaye tha'i jaya che
basa! Pavitra che te allaha, jena hathamam dareka vastuni sampurna satta che ane jeni tarapha tame badha pacha pheravavamam avaso
soganda che la'inabandha ubha rahenara (pharista'o)na
pachi sampurna rite dhamaki apanara'ona
pachi allahana smaranamam vyasta rahenara'ona
ni:Sanka tamara sauno pujya eka ja che
akaso ane dharati ane te banne vacceni dareka vastu'o ane pasvimano palanahara te ja che
ame duniyana akasane tara'othi sanagaryum
ane vidrohi setanothi suraksa kari
mala'ul a-ala" (pharista'onum eka jutha)na pharista'one sambhalava mate te'o (setano) kana pana nathi lagavi sakata, parantu dareka bajuthi te'one maravamam ave che
bhagadava mate. Ane temana mate hammesa rahevavali yatana che
parantu je ko'i ekada vata sambhali le to (tarata ja) teni pachala salagelo angaro lagi jaya che
te inkara karanara'one savala karo ke tamarum sarjana karavum vadhare agharum che athava jemanum ame (temana uparanta) sarjana karyum? Ame (manavi'o)num sarjana cikani mati vade karyum
parantu tame asvarya pamo cho ane a loko maskari kari rahya che
Ane jyare temane sikhamana apavamam ave che, to a loko nathi manata
ane jyare ko'i camatkarane ju'e che to maskari kare che
ane kahe che ke a to khullu jadu che
sum jyare apane mrtyu pamisum ane mati tatha hadakam tha'i ja'isum, to sum pharivara apanane uthavavamam avase
sum apana pahelana purvajone pana
tame javaba api do ke ha-ha ane tame apamanita (pana) thaso
te to phakta eka sakhata jhatako che, acanaka te'o jova lagase
ane kahese ke haya amarum durbhagya! A ja badalano divasa che
a ja nirnayano divasa che jene tame juthalavata hata
atyacari'one ane temana sathi'one ane jemani te'o allahane chodine bandagi karata hata
(te saune) bhega kari temane jahannamano marga batavi do
ane temane thobhavo, temane savala puchavamam avase
tamane sum tha'i gayum che ke tame ekabijani madada nathi karata
parantu te (sau) ajana divase ajnakari bani gaya
te ekabija tarapha jo'i savala-javaba karava lagase
kahese ke tame to amari pase amari jamani bajuthi avata hata
te'o javaba apase ke na, parantu tame ja imanavala na hata
ane amari balajabari tamara para hati (ja) nahim, parantu tame (pote) vidrohi hata
have ame (badha) para amara palanaharani e vata sabita tha'i ga'i ke ame (yatana)no svada cakhisum
basa! Ame tamane pathabhrasta karya, ame pote ja pathabhrasta hata
ajana divase to (badha ja) yatanamam bhagidara che
ame aparadhi'o sathe avum ja kari'e chi'e
a te'o che ke, jyare temane kahevamam ave ke allaha sivaya ko'i pujya nathi, to a loko vidroha karata hata
ane kaheta hata ke sum ame amara pujyone eka pagala kavini vata mani la'ine chodi da'i'e
(Na na) parantu (payagambara) to satya lavya ane dareka payagambarone saca mane che
ni:Sanka tame du:Khadayi yatanano svada cakhaso
tamane teno ja badalo apavamam avase, je tame karata hata
parantu allaha ta'alana nikhalasa banda'o (suraksita hase)
temana mate ja nakki karela roji che
(dareka prakarana) phalo ane te ijajatavala, pratisthita hase
ne'amato vali jannatomam
asano para ekabijani same hase
sarabana jharanamo manthi pyala bhari-bharine temani vacce pheravavamam avase
je paradarsaka hase ane pivamam svadista hase
na tenathi mathano dukhavo thase ane na to te'o vikrta thase
ane temani pase nici najarovali, sundara ankhovali (huro) hase
evi, jeva ke, chupayela inda
(jannati loko) ekabija same jo'i savala karase
temana manthi eka kahese ke maro eka mitra hato
je kaheto hato ke sum tum (kayamatana divasa para) yakina karavavala'o manthi che
sum jyare apane mrtyu pami, mati ane hadakam bani ja'isum, te divase apanane badalo apavamam avase
kahese ke tame sum jova iccho cho
jotam ni sathe ja tene jahannamani vacce jose
kahese, allaha! Sakya hatum ke tum mane (pana) barabada kari deto
jo mara palanaharano upakara na hota, to hum pana jahannamamam hajara karavavala'o manthi hota
sum (a sacum che) ke ame mrtyu pamavana ja nathi
prathama mrtyu sivaya ane na apanane yatana apavamam avase
pachi to a bhavya saphalata che
avi (saphalata) mate karmo karanara'o'e karma karava jo'i'e
sum a mahemana navaji sari che athava jhakkuma (thora)num vrksa
jene ame atyacari'o mate sakhata kasoti mate banavyum che
Ni:Sanka te vrksa jahannamani jada manthi nikale che
jena guccha setanona matha jeva che
(jahannamana loko) a ja vrksa manthi bhojana karase ane tenathi ja peta bharase
pachi tena upara piva mate, ukalatum pani lavavamam avase
pachi te saunum pachum pharavanum, jahannama tarapha hase
ni:Sanka temane potana purvajone pathabhrasta joya
ane a loko temana ja marga upara dodata rahya
temana pahelana ghana loko pana pathabhrasta tha'i gaya hata
jemani pase ame saceta karanara mokalya hata
have tame jo'i lo ke je lokone dhamaki apavamam avi hati, temani dasa kevi tha'i
allahana nikatana banda'o sivaya
ane amane nuha a.Sa.E pokarya, to (jo'i lo) ame ketala srestha du'a kabula karanara che
ame temane ane temana gharavala'one te bhayanaka musibatathi bacavi didha
ane temana santanane ame baki rahenara banavi didha
ane ame temanum (sarum nama) pachalana lokomam jalavi rakhyum
nuha a.Sa. Para samagra srstina salama che
ame satkarya karavavala'one avi ja rite badalo api'e chi'e
te amara imanavala banda'o manthi hata
pachi ame bijane dubadi didha
ane te (nuha a.Sa.Num) anusarana karanara'o manthi (ja) ibrahima a.Sa. Pana hata
jyare potana palanahara pase pavitra hrdaya lavya
temane potana pita ane komana lokone kahyum, tame ka'i vastuni puja kari rahya cho
sum tame allaha sivaya ghadi kadhela pujyo iccho cho
to evum (janavo ke) tame samagrasrstina palanaharane sum samajo cho
have ibrahima a.Sa.E eka najara tara'o tarapha kari
ane kahyum ke hum bimara chum
ama te loko tenathi modhum pheravi jata rahya
(Ibrahima a.Sa.) Temana pujyo pase gaya ane kaheva lagya ke tame bhojana kema nathi leta
tamane sum tha'i gayum che ke vata pana nathi karata
pachi (sampurna takata sathe) jamana hatha vade temane marava lagya
te (murti pujako) dodata dodata temani pase avya
(ibrahima a.Sa.)E kahyum, tame temani puja kari rahya cho, jemane tame kotaro cho
jo ke tamarum ane tamari banaveli vastu'onum sarjana allaha'e ja karyum
te'o kaheva lagya, tena mate eka ghara banavo ane te (bhalake balati) agamam tene nankhi do
temane to temani (ibrahima) sathe yukti karavanum icchayum, parantu ame temane ja hina kari didha
ane temane kahyum, hum to hijarata kari potana palanahara tarapha javano chum, te jarura mane marga batavase
he mara palanahara! Mane sadacari santana apa
to ame temane eka dhairyavana santanani khusakhabari api

pachi jyare te (balaka) etali vaye pahoncyo ke temani sathe hare-phare, to temane kahyum, mara vhala dikara! Hum sapanamam tane jhabeha karata jo'i rahyo chum, have tum janava ke taro vicara sum che? Dikara'e javaba apyo ke, pitaji! Je adesa apavamam avyo che tene kari lo, "in sa'a allaha" tame mane dhiraja rakhanara pamaso
jyare banne mani gaya ane temane (pita'e) tene (dikarane) undha mathe padi didho
to ame avaja apyo ke he ibrahima
kharekhara tame potana sapanane sacum kari batavyum. Ni:Sanka ame satkaryo karanarane avi ja rite badalo api'e chi'e
kharekhara a khulli kasoti hati
ane ame eka moti kurabani tena phidayahamam (badalamam) api didhi
ane ame temanum sarum nama pachalana lokomam baki rakhyum
ibrahima a.Sa. Para salama che
Ame sadacari lokone avi ja rite badalo api'e chi'e
ni:Sanka te amara imanavala banda'o manthi hata
ane ame temane is'haka a.Sa,payagambarani khusakhabari api, je sadacari loko manthi hase
ane ame ibrahima ane is'haka para khuba krpa kari ane te bannena santana manthi ketalaka sadacari che ane ketalaka potana para khullo atyacara karavavala che
ni:Sanka ame musa ane haruna a.Sa. Para ghano ja upakara karyo
ane temane tatha temani komane khuba ja du:Khadayi yatanathi chutakaro apyo
ane temani madada kari, jethi te'o ja vijayi rahya
ane ame temane prakasita kitaba api
ane temane satya marga para rakhya
ane ame te banne mate pachala avanaramam a vata baki rakhi
ke musa ane haruna a.Sa. Para salama
ni:Sanka ame sadacari lokone avi ja rite badalo api'e chi'e
ni:Sanka te banne amara imanavala banda'o manthi hata
ni:Sanka ilyasa a.Sa. Pana payagambaro manthi hata
jyare temane potani komane kahyum, tame allahathi darata nathi
sum tame ba-a-la (eka murtinum nama)ne pokaro cho? Ane sauthi srestha sarjanaharane chodi do cho
allaha, je tamaro ane tamarathi pahelana lokono palanahara che
parantu komana loko'e temane juthalavya. Basa! Te'one jarura (yatanamam) hajara karavamam avase
allaha ta'alana nikhalasa banda'o sivaya
ame (ilyasa a.Sa.) Num sarum nama pachalana lokomam baki rakhyum
ilyasa para salama
ame satkarya karavavala'one avi ja rite badalo api'e chi'e
ni:Sanka te amara sadacari banda'o manthi hata
ni:Sanka luta a.Sa. Pana payagambaro manthi hata
Ame temane ane temana gharavala'o, darekane chutakaro apyo
te vrdva stri sivaya, je pachala rahenara lokomam baki rahi ga'i
pachi ame bijane nasta kari didha
ane tame savarana samaye temani vasti'o pasethi pasara thava cho
ane ratana samaye pana, sum to pana nathi samajata
ane ni:Sanka yunusa a.Sa. Payagambaro manthi hata
jyare bhagine bhareli hodi tarapha pahoncya
pachi ciththi nankhavamam avi, to te'o hari gaya
to pachi temane machali gali ga'i ane te'o potane ja dosita theravava lagya
basa! Jo te'o pavitratanum varnana na karata
to lokone uthadavana (kayamatana) divasa sudhi machalina petamam raheta
basa! Temane ame sapata medanamam nankhi didha ane te'o te samaye bimara hata
ane temana para chanyado karava mate eka velavalum vrksa ame ugadi didhum
ane ame temane eka lakha karatam pana vadhare loko tarapha mokalya
basa! Te'o imana lavya ane ame temane eka samayagala sudhi vaibhavi jivana apyum
temane pucho ke sum tamara palanaharane dikari'o che ane temana dikara che
athava a loko te samaye hajara hata, jyare ame pharista'onum sarjana strijatimam karyum
jani lo, ke a loko pote ghadi kadheli vato kahi rahya che
ke allahane santana che, kharekhara a loko juththa che
sum allaha ta'ala'e potana mate dikari'one dikara'o para prathamikata api
tamane sum tha'i gayum che? Kevi vato kaheta pharo cho
sum tame samajata pana nathi
athava tamari pase a vatano ko'i spasta puravo che
to java, saca hova to potani ja kitaba la'i avo
Ane te loko'e allaha ane jinnata vacce sambandha theravyo, jo ke jinnato pote jane che ke te'o (avi astha rakhanara loko)yatana same raju karavamam avase
je kami a loko varnana kari rahya che tenathi allaha ta'ala pavitra che
allahana nikhalasa banda'o sivaya
kharekhara tame sau ane tamara pujyo
ko'i ekane pana pathabhrasta kari nathi sakata
je jahannamamam rahevavalo che tena sivaya
(pharista'oni vata evi che ke) amara manthi darekani jagya nakki che
ane ame (allahani bandagi mate) la'inabandha ubha che
ane tena namanum smarana kari rahya che
inkara karanara kaheta hata
ke jo amari same pahelana lokonum varnana karavamam avatum
to ame pana allahana nikatana banda bani jatam
parantu a kura'anano inkara karava lagya, basa! Have najikamam ja jani lese
ane amarum vacana pahelathi ja potana payagambaro mate nakki tha'i gayum che
ke kharekhara te lokoni ja madada karavamam avase
ane amarum ja laskara vijaya melavase
have tame thodanka divasa sudhi temanathi modhum pheravi lo
ane temane jota raho ane te loko pana agala jo'i lese
sum a loko amara prakopani utavala kari rahya che
sambhalo! Jyare amaro prakopa temana medanamam avi jase, te samaye temani savara khuba ja kharaba hase, je lokone saceta karavamam avya hata
tame thodoka samaya sudhi temano vicara karavanum chodi do
ane jota raho ke te loko pana hamana ja jo'i lese
pavitra che tamaro palanahara, je ghani ja ijajatavalo che, te dareka vastuthi (jenum musarika loko) varnana kare che
payagambaro para salama che
Ane dareka prakarani prasansa allaha mate ja che je samagra srstino palanahara che
so-d! A sikhamana apata kura'anana soganda
jo ke inkara karanara'o ahankara ane vivada kari rahya che
ame temanathi pahela pana ghani komone nasta kari didhi, te'o ciso padava lagya, parantu te samaya chutakarano na hato
ane inkara karanara'one e vata para asvarya thayum ke temana manthi ja eka, te'one saceta karanara avyo ane kaheva lagya ke a to jadugara ane juththo che
sum tene atala badha pujyono eka ja pujya kari didho, kharekhara a to asvaryajanaka vata che
temana agevano evum kahetam calava lagya ke, calo ane potana pujyo para adaga raho. Ni:Sanka a vata ko'i hetu mate kahevamam avi rahi che
ame to avi vata pahelana dinamam pana nathi sambhali, kami nathi basa! Ato ghadi kadheli vato che
sum apana manthi phakta ana para ja allahani vani avatarita karavamam avi? Jo ke a loko mari vahi para sanka kari rahya che, jo ke (satya e che ke) te loko'e haju sudhi maro prakopa cakhyo ja nathi
athava sum temani pase tara jabaradasta palanaharani krpana khajana che
athava sum akasa ane dharati ane te banne vacceni dareka vastuni badasahata temani ja che, pachi to te loko doradum bandhi cadhi jaya
a pana (mota mota) laskaro manthi hari gayelum (nanum) laskara che
temana pahela pana nuha ane adani koma ane khuntavala phira'aune juthalavya hata
ane samudana loko, lutani komana loko'e pana ane ayakahana rahevasi'o'e pana, a ja (mota) laskaro hata
temana manthi eka pana eva na hata jemane payagambarone na juthalavya hoya, basa! Mari yatana temana mate sabita tha'i ga'i
Te loko basa! Eka cisani raha jo'i rahya che, jemam thodika pana vara nahim lage
ane te loko'e kahyum ke, he amara palanahara! Amane amaro bhaga kayamatana divasa pahela ja api de
tame temani vato para dhiraja rakho ane amara banda da'uda a.Sa.Ne yada karo, je khuba ja saktisali hata, ni:Sanka te khuba ja raju thanara hata
ame parvatone temana vasamam kari rakhya hata, ke temani sathe sanje ane savare allahana namanum smarana kare
ane paksi'one pana bhega tha'i, dareka temani ajnanum palana karata hata
ane ame temana samrajyane majabuta kari didhum hatum ane temane hikamata api hati ane nirnayaka sakti pana api hati
ane sum tamane jhaghado karavavalani khabara mali? Jyare te'o divala kudine meharaba (orada)mam avi gaya

jyare te'o da'uda a.Sa. Pase avya, to te'o temanathi bhayabhita thaya, temane kahyum, bhayabhita na tha'o, ame phariyadana be paksakaro chi'e, amara manthi eke bija para atireka karyo che, basa! Tame amari vacce n'yaya purvaka phensalo kari do ane an'yaya na karaso ane amane satya marga batavi do
(sambhalo)! A maro bha'i che, teni pase navvanum medhi'o che ane mari pase eka ja medhi che, parantu te mane kahi rahyo che ke tari a eka pana mane api de ane vata-citamam tene mane dabavi didho che

temane kahyum, tenum tari pase eka mendhi mangavum, tara para kharekhara atyacara che ane vadhare padata bhagidaro eka-bija para atireka kare che, imanavala ane satkaryo karanara sivaya ane ava loko ghana ocha che ane da'uda a.Sa. Samaji gaya ke ame temani kasoti kari che, pachi to potana palanaharathi maphi mangava lagya ane ajiji karata padi gaya ane vinamrata dakhavi
Basa! Ame pana temano te (vanka) mapha kari didho, kharekhara te'o amari pase ucca darajjavala che ane khuba ja srestha badalo melavanara che

he da'uda! Ame tamane dharati upara nayaba banavi didha, tame loko vacce n'yayapurvaka nirnaya karo ane potani maneccha'onum anusarana na karo, nahito te tamane allahana margathi bhatakavi dese, ni:Sanka je loko allahana margathi bhataki jaya che, temana mate sakhata yatana che, etala mate ke te'o hisabana divasane bhuli gaya che
ane ame akasa ane dharati ane te banne vacceni vastu'onum sarjana amasta ja nathi karyum. Avum anumana to inkara karanara'onum che, inkara karanara'o mate agani kharabi che
sum ame te lokone, je'o imana lavya ane satkaryo karya, temana jeva kari da'isum, je'o dharati upara vidroha karata rahya athava daravavala'one pathabhrasta loko jeva kari da'isum
a pavitra kitaba che, jene ame tamari tarapha etala mate avatarita kari ke loko teni ayato para cintana kare ane bud'dhisali loko tena dvara sikhamana prapta kare
ane ame da'udane sulaimana apya, je khuba ja sara banda hata ane khuba ja jhukavavala hata
jyare temani pase sanjana samaye khuba ja kelavela ghoda lavavamam avya
to kaheva lagya ke, mem mara palanaharani yada same a ghoda'ona premane prathamikata api, tyam sudhi ke suryasta tha'i gayo
te (ghoda'o) ne pharivara mari pase lavo, pachi pindali'o ane gala para hatha pheravava lagya
ane ame sulaimana a.Sa.Ni kasoti kari ane temana sinhasana para eka sarira nankhi didhum, pachi te'o jhuki gaya
kahyum ke he mara palanahara! Mane mapha kari de ane mane evum samrajya apa, je mara pachi ko'inum na hoya, tum khuba ja apanara che
Basa! Ame havane temana vasamam kari didhi, te temana adesa pramane, jyam te'o icchata, tyam naramasathi pahonci jati hati
ane (saktisali) jinnatone pana (temana adhina kari didha), dareka imarata banavanara'one ane dubaki lagavanarane
ane bija jinna'atone pana, je sankalomam jakadayela hata
a che amari bheta, have tum upakara kara athava roki rakha, kami pana hisaba nathi
temana mate amari pase ghani ja nikatata che ane khuba ja srestha thekanum che
ane amara banda aiyuba a.Sa.Num (pana) varnana karo, jyare te'o'e potana palanaharane pokarya ke mane setane ranja ane du:Kha pahoncadyum che
potano paga mara, a snana karava mate ane piva mate thandu pani che
ane ame temane temanum sampurna kutumba apyum, parantu tena jetala ja bija pana, potana taraphathi krpa tarike ane bud'dhisali lokoni sikhamana mate
ane potana hathamam sali'ono eka jhudo la'ine mari do ane soganda na todo, saci vata to e che ke ame tene ghano ja dhirajavana joyo, te khuba ja sadacari vyakti hato ane khuba ja vinamra hata
amara banda ibrahima, is'haka ane yakuba a.Sa.Num pana varnana loko same karo, je'o hatha ane ankhovala hata
ame temane eka khasa vata etale ke akheratani yada sathe khasa kari didha
a badha amari khuba ja nikata ane srestha loko hata
isma'ila, ya-sa-a ane jhul kiphla (a.Sa.)Num pana varnana kari do, a badha sadacari loko hata
a sikhamana che ane kharekhara daravavala loko mate khuba ja sari jagya che
(etale ke hammesa baki rahevavali) jannato, jena dvara temana mate khulla che
jemam (takiya sathe) teko lagavi betha hase ane dareka prakarana phalo ane saraboni iccha karata hase
Ane temani pase nici najarovali sarakhivayani huro hase
a che te vacana, je tamari sathe hisabana divasa mate, karavamam avatum hatum
ni:Sanka roji (khasa) amari krpa che je kyareya samapta thavani nathi
a to badalo thayo, (yada rakho ke) vidroha karanara mate atyanta kharaba thekanum che
jahannama che, jemam te'o jase, ketalum kharaba patharanum che
a che, basa! Tene cakho, garama pani ane parum
te sivaya biji alaga-alaga prakarani yatana
a eka koma che, je tamari sathe (agamam) jase, ko'i svagata temana mate nathi, a loko ja jahannamamam janara che
te'o kahese ke tame ja cho, jemana mate ko'i svagata nathi, tame loko ja ane pahelathi amari same lavya hata, basa! Raheva mateni khuba ja kharaba jagya che
te'o kahese ke he amara palanahara! Jene (inkarano rivaja) amara mate pahelathi ja kadhyo hoya, tena mate jahannamani saja bamani kari de
ane jahannami loko kahese ke, sum vata che ke te lokone apane nathi jo'i rahya, jemane apane kharaba lokomam ganata hata
sum apane ja temani maskari karata hata athava apani najara temana parathi hathi ga'i che
kharekhara jahannami lokono a jhaghado jarura thase
kahi do! Ke, hum to phakta saceta karanaro chum ane eka, vijayi, allaha sivaya ko'i pujya nathi
je akaso, dharati ane je kami te banneni vacce che, te badhano palanahara che. Te jabaradasta ane khuba ja mapha karavavalo che
tame kahi do ke a khuba ja moti vata che
jenathi tame bedarakara tha'i rahya cho
mane te ucca, pratisthita pharista'oni (vatonum) ko'i jnana nathi, jyare te'o takarara kari rahya hata
mari tarapha phakta te ja vahi karavamam ave che ke, hum to spasta rite saceta karanara chum
Jyare tamara palanahare pharista'one kahyum ke hum mati vade manavinum sarjana karavano chum
to jyare hum tene vyavasthita kari la'um ane temam potani ruha phunki da'um, to tame sau teni same sijado karajo
tethi dareka pharista'o'e sijado karyo
parantu iblise (na karyo), tene ghamanda karyum ane te inkara karanara'o manthi hato

(allaha ta'ala'e) kahyum, he iblisa! Tane teni same sijado karavathi kevi vastu'e rokyo? Jenum sarjana mem mara hatho vade karyum. Sum tum ahankari bani gayo che? Athava to ucca darajja vala'o manthi che
tene javaba apyo ke hum ana karata srestha chum, te marum sarjana aga vade karyum ane anum mati vade
adesa apyo ke tum ahinyathi jato rahe, tum dhrtkarelo che
ane tara para kayamatana divasa sudhi mari la'anata ane phitakara che
kaheva lagyo ke mara palanahara! Mane lokona (biji vakhata) jivita thavana divasa sudhi mahetala apa
(allaha ta'ala'e) kahyum, tum te loko manthi che je lokone mahetala apavamam avi
nakki karela muddatana divasa sudhi
kaheva lagyo ke pachi to tari ijajatana soganda! Ni:Sanka hum te saune pathabhrasta karisa
tara te banda'o sivaya, jemane visista kari lidha
kahyum ke satya to a che, ane hum sacum ja kahum chum
ke tane ane tarum anusarana karanara dareka lokothi, hum jahannamane bhari da'isa
kahi do ke hum tamari pase ana mate ko'i valatara nathi mangato ane na to hum balajabari karavavalo chum
a to samagra srstina loko mate spasta sikhamana che
ni:Sanka tame ani satyatane thodanka ja samaya pachi jani leso
a kitabanum avatarana, vijayi, hikamatavala allaha taraphathi che
Ni:Sanka ame a kitabane tamari tarapha satya sathe avatarita kari, basa! Tame allaha ta'alani ja bandagi karo, tena mate ja dinane nikhalasa karata

saceta raho! Allaha mate ja nikhalasatathi bandagi karavi ane je loko'e tene chodine bijane dosta banavi rakhya che, (ane kahe che) ke ame to temani bandagi phakta etala mate kari rahya che ke allahani nikata pahonci java mate amara mate bhalamana kari de, a loko jena vise vivada kari rahya che teno nirnaya allaha karase, juththa ane krtaghni lokone allaha marga nathi batavato
jo allaha ta'alani iccha santanani hota, to potana sarjana manthi jene icchato pasanda kari leto, (parantu) te to pavitra che, te ja allaha che, je eka ja che ane khuba ja saktisali che

atyanta sari kusalatathi tene akaso ane dharatinum sarjana karyum, te ratane divasa para tatha divasane ratamam lapeti de che ane tene surya tatha candrane kama para lagavi rakhya che, dareka nakki karela samaya sudhi cali rahya che, ni:Sanka te ja jabaradasta ane papono mapha karanara che

tene tamara saunum sarjana eka ja prana vade karyum che, pachi tenathi ja tena jodidara banavya ane tamara mate dhoro manthi (atha prakarana jodi'o) utari, te tamarum sarjana tamari mata'ona garbhamam eka banavata pachi biji banavate kare che, trana-trana andhara'omam, a ja allaha tamaro palanahara che, teni ja badasahata che, tena sivaya ko'i pujya nathi. To pana tame kyam pathabhrasta tha'i rahya cho

Jo tame krtaghnata karo, to (yada rakho ke), allaha ta'ala tamara (sauthi) beniyajha che ane te potana banda'oni krtaghnatathi raji nathi ane jo tame abhara vyakata karo, to te tene tamara mate pasanda karase ane ko'i ko'ino bhara nathi uthavato, pachi tamare sau'e tamara palanahara tarapha ja pacha pharavanum che, tamane te janavi dese je kami tame karata hata, ni:Sanka te hrdayoni vatone pana sari rite jane che

ane manavine jyare pana ko'i takalipha pahonce che, to te vinamrata potana palanaharane pokare che, pachi jyare allaha ta'ala tene potani pasethi krpa api de che, to te (krpa malya) pahela je du'a karato hato, tene bhuli jaya che ane allaha ta'alana bhagidara theravava lage che, jenathi (bijane pana) tena margathi dura kari de, tame kahi do! Ke potana inkarano labha thoda divasa haju uthavi lo, (chevate) tum jahannami loko manthi thavano che

sum je vyakti ratrino samaya sijada ane kiyama (namajha)mam pasara karato hoya, akheratathi darato hoya ane potana palanaharani krpani asa rakhato hoya, (ane je tenathi virud'dha hoya sarakha ho'i sake che?) Janavo jnani ane ajnani sarakha ho'i sake che? Ni:Sanka sikhamana te ja loko prapta kare che, je'o bud'dhisali che. (Potana palanahara taraphathi)

kahi do ke, he mara imanavala banda'o! Potana palanaharathi darata raho, je loko a duniyamam satkaryo kare che temana mate srestha badalo che ane allaha ta'alani dharati ghani ja visala che, dhiraja rakhanara'one ja temano sampurna, khuba ja badalo apavamam ave che
tame kahi do! Ke mane adesa apavamam avyo che ke allaha ta'alani evi rite bandagi karum ke tena mate ja nikhalasatathi bandagi karum
ane mane adesa apavamam avyo che ke, hum badham karata pahela ajnakari bani ja'um
Kahi do! Ke mane to potana palanaharani avajna karavamam, mota divasani yatanano dara lage che
kahi do! Ke hum nikhalasatathi potana palanaharani ja bandagi karum chum

tame tena sivaya jeni bandagi karava iccho, karata raho, kahi do! Ke sace ja pathabhrasta te che, je pote ja potane ane potana gharavala'one kayamatana divase nukasanamam nankhi de, yada rakho ke khullum nukasana, a ja che
temane nice ane uparathi agana chanyada dhanki rahya hase, a ja (yatana) che, jenathi allaha ta'ala potana banda'one daravi rahyo che. He mara banda'o! Basa! Tame marathi darata raho
ane je loko tagutani bandagithi alaga rahya ane allaha ta'ala tarapha dhyana dharata rahya, te'o khusakhabarana hakadara che, mara banda'one khusakhabara sambhalavi do
je vatane kana lagavi sambhale che, pachi je srestha vata hoya, tenum anusarana kare che, a ja te loko che, jemane allaha ta'ala'e satya marga batavyo che ane a ja loko bud'dhisali pana che
je vyakti mate yatanano nirnaya tha'i gayo che, to sum tame tene jahannamathi bacavi sako cho

ham! Te loko je'o potana palanaharathi darata rahya, temana mate ucca sthano che, jena upara pana ucca sthano banela che ane teni nice nahero vahi rahi che, palanaharanum vacana che ane te vacanabhanga nathi karato

sum tame nathi joyum ke allaha ta'ala akasa manthi pani utare che ane tene bhugarbha sudhi pahoncade che, tyara pachi tena vade alaga-alaga prakarani upajo upajave che, pachi te suki padi jaya che ane tame tene pila kalarani ju'o cho, pachi tene cure-cura kari de che, amam bud'dhisali loko mate ghani sikhamano che

Sum te vyakti, jenum hrdaya allaha ta'ala'e islama mate kholi didhum che, basa! Te potana palanahara taraphathi eka prakasamam che ane barabadi che te loko mate, jemana hrdaya allahani yadathi sakhata tha'i gaya che, a loko spasta rite pathabhrasta che

allaha ta'ala'e uttama vata avatarita kari che, je evi kitaba che ke ekabija sathe malati ane varanvara padhavamam avati ayato che, jenathi te lokona runvata ubha tha'i jaya che, je'o potana palanaharathi dare che, chevate temana sarira ane hrdaya allahani yadathi narama padi jaya che, a che allaha ta'alanum margadarsana, jena dvara jene icche, satya marga batave che ane jene allaha ta'ala ja marga bhulavi de, tene marga batavanara ko'i nathi
je vyakti kayamatana divase kharaba yatanathi bacava potana caherane ada banavase, (ava) atyacari lokone kahevamam avase ke pote karela (karyoni saja) cakho
temana karata pahelana loko'e pana juthalavyum, pachi temana para tyanthi prakopa avi pahoncyo jena vise te'o vicarata pana na hata
ane allaha ta'ala'e te lokone duniyana jivanamam apamanano svada cakhadyo ane haju akheratani sakhata yatana che, kadaca a loko samajata hota
ane ni:Sanka ame a kura'anamam loko mate dareka prakarana udaharana api didha, kevum sarum thata ke te'o sikhamana prapta kari leta
kura'ana che arabimam, jemam ko'i khami nathi, bani sake che ke te'o darava lage

allaha ta'ala udaharana varnavi rahyo che, te (dasa) vyakti, jena malika thavamam paraspara ghana virodhi loko bhagidara che, tatha bijo te vyakti, je phakta (malika)no ja (dasa) che, sum a banne sarakha ho'i sake che, allaha ta'ala mate ja dareka prakarani prasansa che, vata evi che ke temanthi ghana loko samajata nathi
Ni:Sanka tamane pana mrtyu avase ane a sau loko pana mrtyu pamase
pachi tame sau kayamatana divase potana palanaharani same jhaghado karaso
